about.homeTitle: A content platform with permanent storage and copyright confirmation
about.homeDes:
Instant MATATAKI is a high-quality content platform that protects the rights and interests of creators. Through the IPFS protocol, the permanent accessibility and confirmation information of the content can be queried; Fan tickets are used to inspire creators, explorers, and evangelists to build a super knowledge of the future 
Link the network; committed to returning to a more open and decentralized Internet.
about.painPointTitle2: Rights are difficult to be protected
about.painPointDes1:
The point incentives of traditional creative platforms make participants feel that they are outsiders. Although they have contributed to the platform, they lack an open and transparent mechanism and cannot avoid platform black box operations. There may be problems such as point invalidation, additional point issuance, and uncirculated transactions of points. 
.
about.painPointDes2:
The author's content and creation behavior data are stored in the platform database, which can be deleted at will without trust, so it is difficult to prove the copyright of the content. 
Once legal rights protection is needed, effective evidence is lacking.
about.painPointDes3:
Writing enthusiasts record their writing in the creation platform, social network, and WeChat official account. 
However, these platforms can freely delete and modify your content, ban your account at will, and the website may also be suspended.
about.programDes1:
The cold start phase focuses on meeting user needs and verifying the business model, earning points through attention mining and labor mining, and using points to circulate within the product. 
After the official launch, it will be mapped into an ecological token proportionally, and will give users many platform rights.
about.programDes2: Instant MATATAKI adopts the Interplanetary File System (IPFS) protocol, each file only has a unique copy, which reduces the waste of storage resources, reduces storage costs, and realizes that platform resources will never be lost, and the website will never be shut down, ensuring permanent and effective user rights.
about.programDes3:
It supports login using decentralized accounts of mainstream public chains such as EOS and Ontology, and the platform cannot touch the user's private key. 
Using IPFS technology to record content modification operations, no one, including the platform, can tamper.
about.blockTitle1: Permanent record of copyright, efficient time stamp
about.blockDes1:
Blockchain and digital copyright protection can be perfectly combined to solve the current situation of rampant piracy. 
First of all, in the process of right confirmation, the patent application process under the existing mechanism is time-consuming and inefficient. 
The distributed ledger and time-stamping technology of the blockchain makes it possible for the entire network to quickly reach a consensus on the ownership of intellectual property rights, and in theory, timely confirmation of rights can be achieved. 
The asymmetric encryption technology guarantees the uniqueness of the copyright, and the time stamp technology guarantees the copyright owner. The copyright owner can quickly and easily complete the process of confirming the right, which solves the problem of the inefficiency of the traditional right confirmation mechanism.
about.blockTitle2: IPFS storage content, permanent records will not be deleted
about.blockDes2:
IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) is called InterPlanetary File System in Chinese. It is a hypermedia transmission protocol based on content addressing, versioning, and point-to-point. It integrates P2P network technology, BitTorrent transmission technology, Git version control, self-certified file system, etc. 
Technology that allows participants in the network to store, request, and transmit verifiable data to each other. 
Moreover, the data on the IPFS protocol can be permanently stored on the Web without deleting the data. 
The distributed network that no longer depends on the backbone network can effectively resist hackers' attacks on centralized servers, and user data and privacy can be better protected.
about.blockTitle3: Platform rewards, win-win with ecological co-builders
about.blockDes31: Instant MATATAKI will give back to all co-builders participating in ecological construction!
about.blockDes32: Because your attention helps us better judge the quality of the content, your attention will directly help other explorers save time!
about.blockDes33: Because your creative power helps us develop and grow better, and your creative power will directly help every explorer to progress!
about.blockDes34: Because your communication power has helped us to be better known to everyone, and the communication power you have given will make the world a better place!
about.stageDes11: Establish a platform for content sharing and permanent storage
about.stageDes21: Establish a copyright protection system to fight against illegal activities
about.stageDes22: Create a secure blockchain content ecology
about.stageDes31: Establish a platform for human knowledge sharing and innovation
about.stageDes32: Create a blockchain permanent knowledge database

publish.original: I declare that this article is my original
publish.modalTextText: Are you sure to leave the page?
publish.importInput: Please enter the article URL link, including http(s)://
publish.importDes1: Currently supports: 链闻、橙皮书、微信、知乎专栏、Matters、简书、微博文章、币乎。
publish.importDes2: If an infringement is found in the content published on this platform, the official has the right to remove the work and reserves the right to pursue legal responsibility for the infringer.
publish.importError: Import failed, currently only supports: 链闻、橙皮书、微信、知乎专栏、Matters、简书、微博文章、币乎。
publish.statement:
Checking this original statement means you confirm and promise that the article, including the pictures and other elements used in the article, was created independently by you (or the organization holding the account), or has obtained the right of the original work 
License. 
Do not check this original statement for articles with the following circumstances:
publish.statement1: 1. Works produced by distortion, falsification, plagiarism, and plagiarism created by others,
publish.statement2:
2. The main length of the article is public content such as "laws, regulations, resolutions, decisions, orders of state agencies, and other legislative, administrative, and judicial documents, current affairs news, calendars, general numbers, general tables and formulas", etc. 
；
publish.statement3: 3. Repost the content formed by others' works,
publish.statement4: 4. Cite other people's content or the main content of the article for a large amount of time, such as book abstracts, abstracts, newspaper abstracts, etc.;
publish.statement5: 5. The main system of the article integrates and compiles the content of others' works
publish.statement6: 6. Content formed by other means of infringing copyright or other rights.
publish.statement7: After obtaining the consent of the original author or right holder, the adaptation, translation and re-creation of the work shall be regarded as original.
publish.statement8:
Instant MATATAKI encourages users to post original articles, and articles with this original statement will display the original logo. 
However, this original statement is only your unilateral commitment to the originality of the content of the article, and does not mean that MATATAKI has approved the originality of the article. 
If you check this original statement and the article proves to be not an independent original, MATATAKI will be removed from the shelves in accordance with the platform specifications.

Use this function to transfer the authorship and profit rights of the article to another user. 
The option to accept permission transfer is turned off by default and needs to be manually turned on in the settings. 
The transferable objects are published articles and articles in the draft box. 
Do not abuse this feature!

You can copy the widget code into the article editor of Shun MATATAKI, so that you can insert beautiful article display cards in your article. 
Of course, the article card you show will also have an invitation link function.

creative-commons-tips:
CC is a public copyright license agreement that allows the distribution of works protected by copyright. 
A creative sharing license is used for the right of an author to share, use, or even create derivative works for others.
others-can-no-longer-mix-convert-or-crea: Others can no longer mix, convert, or create based on the work, and cannot distribute the modified work

sa-tips: Anyone who remixes, converts, or creates based on this work must distribute the work based on the same license agreement as the original license agreement.

aggregate-dynamic-help-content:
Aggregated dynamics is a place where the timelines of various third-party social networking sites are integrated. The data here comes from the personal dynamic information of the platform bound to the users you follow. 
Currently, we provide updates on Twitter, Bilibili, and Mastodon. 
After the platform is successfully bound, the dynamic and timeline data will be displayed in this place.
aggregate-dynamic-help-content-1:
You can filter, view, and browse the different dynamic information of people you follow from different platforms in the sidebar. You can open only a part of the platform separately, or even filter to display only one platform; if you don’t like it, you can just click " 
Site News" to go to Matataki's own dynamic page.
aggregate-dynamic-help-content-2: At the bottom of the filter bar, you can see the status of the platform that the user you are following is currently bound to. Gray means unbound.
aggregate-dynamic-help-content-3: Because the data needs to wait for the server to obtain the data at a certain frequency before it can be displayed.
aggregate-dynamic-help-content-4:
The data source is a third party. Constant requests for dynamic data will put a certain pressure on the server, so we will periodically obtain these data within a period of time and refresh the display here. If you want to know the frequency of data acquisition on different platforms, you can 
Check the table below:

home-introduction-1: All content created on Matataki is uploaded to distributed storage on multiple common nodes of IPFS (Interstellar File System), making it permanently accessible without fear of deletion. Your data is just belong to yourself.
home-introduction-2: Matataki hopes to attract creators with independent spirit around interesting topics and deep thinking, build a unique content value network, and rely on blockchain technology to build a stable and high-quality community platform to protect the copyright of the content created. With unique algorithms, high-quality content emerges, and digital currency and fan tokens enable creators and participants to obtain continuous returns.
home-title:
We help freecreators
get more returns
Buildan open and foreverlibrary of digital works
no-need-to-worry-about-being-harmonized-: You don't have to worry about delegation. Your content is stored permanently on the IPFS distributed network and can't be modified by anyone for future rights on other platforms.
powerful-content-editor-no-one-can-influ: Powerful content editor, no one can affect your creative freedom, everything is under control. You can also allow your true fans the privilege of making suggestions for you.
let-fans-use-your-personal-token-to-unlo: Let fans use your issued personal token to unlock the article! The value of your personal token will continue to increase! Fan tokens are not only your own currency, they're also your mark as fellow travelers.

any-of-your-articles-can-be-set-to-pay-t.-As-long-as-it-is-a-high-quality-work-ev: Any of your articles can be set to pay to unlock, do not underestimate the fans' love of your work, as long as it is high quality work, even if you need to pay, they will often have-the motivation to pay! Even rewards with personal token.

every-free-creation-should-be-recorded-f: Every piece of free writing should be recorded forever.
there-is-no-need-to-worry-about-being-ha: You don't have to worry about delegation. Your content is stored permanently on the IPFS distributed network and can't be modified by anyone for future rights on other platforms.
connect-and-share-your-work-to-your-fan-: Connect and share your work to your fan base, such as Weibo, WeChat official account, WeChat group, etc.
when-the-content-that-you-set-paid-to-be: When you set up paid visible content to be viewed, you get revenue immediately. Excellent works can even receive extra rewards.
what-is-the-relationship-between-the-per: What is the relationship between personal tokens and Matataki?
what-are-the-advantages-of-using-Matatak: What are the advantages of using Matataki?
what-if-my-work-is-infringed: What if my work is infringed?
home-qa-1: A personal token is a digital currency issued by an individual, also known as a Fanticket on Matataki, that is used to pay to unlock personally created content associated with you. It can also be used as a "fan token" to unlock some of your creations as long as you hold a certain amount. InstantMatataki is the first content creation platform to use personal tokens as a means of payment and core verification. In the future, Matataki will also develop more interesting usage scenarios based on personal tokens. More instructions can be found.
home-qa-2: Instant Matataki is a great and safe platform for creators to create content: we don't sign on, we don't have any restrictions on how often content can be published. Built-in powerful Markdown editor, and support for direct import of your work on multiple other content platforms. Use decentralized storage technology to ensure the safety of your works, avoid the suffering of delection! You just create freely!
home-qa-3: Matataki is completely free to use for all users.Any transaction fees involved in the on-chain transaction will be deducted from the wallet.
home-qa-4: All articles are time-stamped and use blockchain technology, and can't be tampered with. This can be used as strong evidence in the case of rights protection. We are gradually rolling out a community governance system to strengthen the control of infringing content.
